Create difference map (change visualization)

Source: R/visualization.R
plot_difference_map.Rd

Visualizes the difference between two scenarios.

Usage

plot_difference_map(
  data1,
  data2,
  indicator,
  type = c("absolute", "relative"),
  palette = "RdBu",
  title = NULL,
  legend_title = NULL,
  ...
)

Arguments

data1

First sf object (baseline)

data2

Second sf object (comparison)

indicator

Indicator column name

type

Character. Type of difference: "absolute" (data2 - data1) or "relative" ((data2-data1)/data1 * 100)

palette

Color palette. Default "RdBu" (diverging red-blue)

title

Plot title

legend_title

Legend title

...

Additional arguments

Value

A ggplot object showing differences

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
plot_difference_map(
  current_state,
  future_scenario,
  indicator = "carbon",
  type = "relative",
  title = "Carbon Stock Change (%)"
)
} # }
